typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		country as string,
		country_code as string,
		continent as string,
		population as integer,
		indicator as string,
		weekly_count as integer,
		year_week as string,
		rate_14_day as double,
		cumulative_count as integer,
		source as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	limit: 100,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	wildcardPaths:['ecdc/cases_deaths.csv']) ~> casesDeaths
casesDeaths filter(continent=="Europe") ~> filterEuropeData
filterEuropeData select(mapColumn(
		country_code,
		country,
		population,
		indicator,
		weekly_count,
		year_week,
		cumulative_count,
		source,
		each(match(type == "string"),
			$$ + "_string" = $$)
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> selectRequiredColumns
selectRequiredColumns pivot(groupBy(country,
		country_code,
		year_week,
		source),
	pivotBy(indicator, ['cases', 'deaths']),
	Count = sum(weekly_count),
	columnNaming: '$N$V',
	lateral: true) ~> pivotEuropeData
pivotEuropeData sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	umask: 0022,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> tempSink
